short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BlockNotes: A bold, Neo-Brutalist note-taking extension for instant, synced, and fun note organization with style!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BlockNotes: Instant. Bold. Powerful. A note-taking app for people who don’t waste time.

Forget about the fluff. BlockNotes is designed to be intuitive, fast, and bold—perfect for anyone who wants to capture ideas and organize chaos without distractions. Whether you’re brainstorming or managing complex projects, BlockNotes brings your notes to life in a design that’s as functional as it is striking. Keep your notes at your fingertips whenever you need them.

Features
Create Notes You Always Need INSTANTLY
Open a new tab and start typing. Paste directly from the clipboard. No delays. No distractions. Just raw speed for capturing the context you always needed.

Slash Command Search
Hit /, type the note you’re after, hit Enter, and it’s done. No scrolling. No hunting. Just pure accessibility.

Drag & Drop Control
Organize your notes exactly the way you want them. Move, rearrange, and structure your ideas on the fly with effortless drag-and-drop.

Gemini Magic
Automatically generate names for your notes based on their content. Need to change it? No problem. Instant, smart naming—it’s quick and customizable.

Custom Shortcuts
Set your own shortcut to get to BlockNotes in a flash. Custom control—for your workflow, your pace.

Sync Across Devices
Google Sync keeps your notes updated across all your devices. Whether you’re on your phone, tablet, or desktop, everything is in perfect sync.

Bold Neo-Brutalist Design
The design is functional, powerful, and bold—with a sharp, utilitarian aesthetic that helps you stay focused. There’s nothing extra, just what you need to stay productive.

Why BLOCKNOTES?
1. Power at Your Fingertips: BlockNotes is intuitive, fast, and designed for maximum efficiency. Capture and organize your notes in seconds—no extra clicks, no wasted time.

2. Bold, Utilitarian Design: The Neo-Brutalist design doesn’t just look cool—it’s built to keep you focused. Bold lines, minimal fluff, and maximum function.

3. Total Sync: Start on one device and finish on another—your notes are always up-to-date and perfectly synced with Google Sync.

4. Custom Flexibility: Tailor your experience with custom shortcuts and automatic note naming that fit your workflow, making it even more intuitive.

Ready for Powerful, Bold Note-Taking?
BlockNotes isn’t here to mess around. It’s designed to help you get things done quickly, boldly, and with the intuitive power you need. Take control of your notes and get organized, instantly.

Get BlockNotes and make your note-taking as powerful as you are. Keep your notes at your fingertips whenever you need them.
